result.eng: I don't bloody care about the pictures!
result.ga: Is cuma sa diabhal liom faoi na pictiúir
result.orig: Is cuma sa diabhal liom faoi na pictiúir
result.html: Is cuma sa diabhal liom faoi na pictiúirI don't bloody care about the pictures!
result.ponchtml: Is cuma sa diaḃal liom faoi na pictiúirI don't bloody care about the pictures!

result.eng: While I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...
result.ga: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime dom
